main event: A large, disc-shaped object was observed hovering over a mountain in Red Bluff, California for 15-20 minutes before suddenly disappearing.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 150 feet in diameter.
The object was observed at an elevation of 10 degrees over an 8,000-foot mountain.
The observers were looking in various directions when the object was seen.
The object's disappearance coincided with it either setting behind the mountain or vanishing suddenly.
The case was evaluated as being of an unknown nature, with insufficient data for a definitive evaluation.
photographs: yes, the report indicates that photographs were taken
